title: SMNTY Classics: The Craft
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: The Craft
description:
We're the weirdos, mister. In this classic episode, Anney and Samantha revisit the 1996 cult classic The Craft, and dig into the themes of witches, community and the power and pitfalls of female friendship. Relax, it's only magic!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:keywords: stuff mom never told you, momstuff, mom stuff, anney reese, smnty, feminism, feminist, activism, social justice, samantha mcvey, the craft, craft movie, witches, movies with witches, feminist movies, feminist horror movies, the craft feminism
